conversation.message:
Dear Student_E,

Thank you for your message and for your continued interest in School_C.

On process/timing: we do not have a specific “cutoff round” when we stop holding the seat for higher-priority applicants who have not yet applied. With a single seat, we finalize admission on a rolling basis when we receive an [APPLY] and can offer the seat to the highest-priority applicant among those actively applying at that time.

Practically, this means we cannot pre-commit the seat in advance, and we also cannot guarantee that the seat will become available to you in a later round. If you submit an [APPLY] again in a future round, we will evaluate it under the same priority order and respond accordingly.

Given the uncertainty, we strongly encourage you to continue pursuing other schools in parallel so you do not miss opportunities.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions
